survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Electric Vehicle (EV) Public Charging Stations Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from electric vehicle owners regarding their satisfaction with public charging stations, including ease of use, availability, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to ensure clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations?
script.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a public EV charging station? (Select all that apply.)
answer_options: Charging speed (e.g., Level 2, DC Fast Charging)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears if the respondent selects 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow respondents to select multiple factors.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a public EV charging station? (Select all that apply.)
answer_options: Charging speed (e.g., Level 2, DC Fast Charging)
script.routing_logic: This question appears if the respondent selects 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area?
script.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in public EV charging stations?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears if the respondent selects 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q3.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended format to allow detailed feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in public EV charging stations?
script.routing_logic: This question appears if the respondent selects 'Dissatisfied' or 'Very dissatisfied' in Q3.

questions.question_text: Have you encountered any issues with public EV charging stations? If yes, please describe.
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended format to gather detailed feedback on issues.

script.question_text: Have you encountered any issues with public EV charging stations? If yes, please describe.
script.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
